events.name: New York Jets at Cleveland Browns

headlines.description: — Joe Flacco has turned a seemingly cursed season into a charmed one.
headlines.shortLinkText: Joe Flacco throws 3 TD passes and Browns clinch unlikely spot in playoffs with 37-20 win over Jets

headlines.description: — CeeDee Lamb could only watch from the sideline in the final seconds of the best game of his career, hoping it would be enough for a 16th consecutive home victory for the Dallas Cowboys.
headlines.shortLinkText: Cowboys deny Lions on 2-point try for 20-19 win to extend home win streak to 16

events.name: New England Patriots at Buffalo Bills

headlines.description: — The Buffalo Bills acquired cornerback Rasul Douglas at the trade deadline to shore up a depleted defense and reverse the team's slide in the standings.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bills set up AFC East-deciding finale at Miami with 27-21 win over Patriots

headlines.description: — Justin Fields noticed the smoke in the air and the cigars on a table as he walked into the locker room. By then, the celebration was under way.
headlines.shortLinkText: Justin Fields, DJ Moore lead way as Bears deal Falcons' hopes a big blow with 37-17 romp

events.name: Las Vegas Raiders at Indianapolis Colts

headlines.description: — Jonathan Taylor and Gardner Minshew spent all week talking about the need to take advantage of this week's big opportunity.
headlines.shortLinkText: Taylor, Minshew help Colts stay in AFC playoff chase with 23-20 victory over Raiders

events.name: Los Angeles Rams at New York Giants

headlines.description: — The Los Angeles Rams returned to the postseason after a year's absence with a little help following a game during which they didn't look like much of a playoff team.
headlines.shortLinkText: Kyren Williams runs for 3 TDs as Rams beat Giants 26-25 and clinch playoff berth with Seahawks loss

headlines.description: — Jalen Hurts’ desperation heave was intercepted to seal the Eagles' fourth loss this month and one that meant so much more.
headlines.shortLinkText: Kyler Murray throws 3 TD passes as Cardinals rally past Eagles, disrupt Philly's playoff path

events.name: New Orleans Saints at Tampa Bay Buccaneers

headlines.description: — The tight NFC South race is going down to the final week of the regular season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Carr throws for 2 TDs to help the Saints beat the Bucs 23-13 and tie NFC South standings

headlines.description: — Minutes after rolling to a 27-10 victory at Washington, the San Francisco 49ers watched the final minute of Philadelphia's game at Arizona together in the visiting locker room.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brock Purdy bounces back, 49ers clinch the NFC’s top seed by beating the Commanders 27-10

video.headline: Purdy avoids sack, rolls right, then finds Aiyuk for TD

tracking.trackingName: *UNPUB 1/4* NFL_One-Play (Purdy avoids sack, rolls right, then finds Aiyuk for TD) 2023/12/31 ESHEET

headlines.description: — A record-setting day for the Jacksonville Jaguars set up a regular-season finale that will determine their postseason fate.
headlines.shortLinkText: Travis Etienne scores twice, Jaguars end 4-game skid with 26-0 shutout of woeful Panthers

headlines.description: — Lamar Jackson and the Baltimore Ravens clinched a division title and the top seed in the AFC.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lamar Jackson's perfect passer rating helps Ravens rout Dolphins 56-19 to clinch top seed in AFC

video.headline: Isaiah Likely makes incredible one-handed catch and score

tracking.trackingName: *UNPUB 1/6* NFL_One-Play (Isaiah Likely makes incredible one-handed catch and score) 2023/12/31 ESHEET

headlines.description: — When the Houston Texans selected C.J. Stroud with the No. 2 pick in this year's draft, the consensus was that he'd turn this team around eventually.
headlines.shortLinkText: Stroud has 213 yards and TD as Texans improve playoff hopes with 26-3 win over Titans

headlines.description: — The punishing runs from Najee Harris and Jaylen Warren and a handful of clutch throws from Mason Rudolph have lifted the Pittsburgh Steelers into the final week of the regular season with their playoff hopes still alive.
headlines.shortLinkText: Steelers keep playoff hopes alive into Week 18 with 30-23 win over Seahawks

events.name: Los Angeles Chargers at Denver Broncos

headlines.description: — The Denver Broncos got that spark they were looking for with a quarterback switch — from their defense, anyway.
headlines.shortLinkText: Stidham uneven in 1st start in place of Wilson as Broncos rely on defense to beat Chargers 16-9

events.name: Cincinnati Bengals at Kansas City Chiefs

headlines.description: — The Kansas City Chiefs have grown accustomed to wrapping up the AFC West by the middle of December.
headlines.shortLinkText: Harrison Butker hits 6 field goals, kicks Chiefs to AFC West title with 25-17 win over Bengals

events.name: Green Bay Packers at Minnesota Vikings

headlines.description: — Jordan Love and Aaron Jones put on party hats and popped a sparkling drink in the apex of an all-night celebration for the Green Bay Packers — at
headlines.shortLinkText: Packers take control of playoff spot on Love's 4-touchdown night in 33-10 cruise past Vikings
